shef.mt.tools

Class MorphAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.tools.MorphAnalyser

  • public class MorphAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
    MorphAnalyser encapsulates the MADA mophological analyser for Arabic It requires the MADA install path and the name of the cript to be run and launches the perl script on the input file specified MADA produces its output in the same folder as the input file, therefore care has to be taken that the required writing rights are available in that folder
